12 using namespace voxblox; // NOLINT

14 DECLARE_bool(alsologtostderr);
15 DECLARE_bool(logtostderr);
16 DECLARE_int32(v);
17 
18 class ClearSphereTest : public ::testing::TestWithParam<FloatingPoint> {
19  public:
20  ClearSphereTest()
21  : depth_camera_resolution_(Eigen::Vector2i(320, 240)),
22  fov_h_rad_(2.61799), // 150 degrees
23  max_dist_(15.0),
24  min_dist_(0.5),
25  voxel_size_(0.10),
26  voxels_per_side_(16) {}
27 
28  virtual void SetUp() {
29  voxel_size_ = GetParam();
30 
31  // Create a test environment.
32  // It consists of a 10x10x7 m environment with an object in the middle and
33  // walls on the side.
34  Point min_bound(-5.0, -5.0, -1.0);
35  Point max_bound(5.0, 5.0, 6.0);
36  world_.setBounds(min_bound, max_bound);
37  world_.addPlaneBoundaries(-4.0, 4.0, -4.0, 4.0);
38  world_.addGroundLevel(0.0);
39 
40  // Next, generate some poses.
41  FloatingPoint radius = 1.0;
42  FloatingPoint height = 2.0;
43  int num_poses = 10;
44  poses_.reserve(num_poses);
45 
46  FloatingPoint max_angle = 2 * M_PI;
47 
48  FloatingPoint angle_increment = max_angle / num_poses;
49  for (FloatingPoint angle = 0.0; angle < max_angle;
50  angle += angle_increment) {
51  // Generate a transformation to look at the center pose.
52  Point position(radius * sin(angle), radius * cos(angle), height);
53  Point facing_direction(sin(angle), cos(angle), 0.0);
54 
55  FloatingPoint desired_yaw = 0.0;
56  if (std::abs(facing_direction.x()) > 1e-4 ||
57  std::abs(facing_direction.y()) > 1e-4) {
58  desired_yaw = atan2(facing_direction.y(), facing_direction.x());
59  }
60 
61  // Face the desired yaw and pitch forward a bit to get some of the floor.
62  Quaternion rotation =
63  Quaternion(Eigen::AngleAxis<FloatingPoint>(-0.1, Point::UnitY())) *
64  Eigen::AngleAxis<FloatingPoint>(desired_yaw, Point::UnitZ());
65 
66  poses_.emplace_back(Transformation(rotation, position));
67  }
68 
69  // Finally, get the GT.
70  tsdf_gt_.reset(new Layer<TsdfVoxel>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
71  esdf_gt_.reset(new Layer<EsdfVoxel>(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_));
72 
73  truncation_distance_ = 4 * voxel_size_;
74  esdf_max_distance_ = 4.0f;
75 
76  LOG(INFO) << "Truncation distance: " << truncation_distance_
77  << " ESDF max distance: " << esdf_max_distance_;
78 
79  world_.generateSdfFromWorld(truncation_distance_, tsdf_gt_.get());
80  world_.generateSdfFromWorld(esdf_max_distance_, esdf_gt_.get());
81  }
82 
83  protected:
84  SimulationWorld world_;
85 
86  // Camera settings
87  Eigen::Vector2i depth_camera_resolution_;
88  FloatingPoint fov_h_rad_;
89  FloatingPoint max_dist_;
90  FloatingPoint min_dist_;
91  int num_viewpoints_;
92 
93  // Map settings
94  FloatingPoint voxel_size_;
95  int voxels_per_side_;
96  FloatingPoint truncation_distance_;
97  FloatingPoint esdf_max_distance_;
98 
99  // Generated viewpoints
100  AlignedVector<Transformation> poses_;
101 
102  // Maps (GT and generates from sensors) generated here.
103  std::unique_ptr<Layer<TsdfVoxel> > tsdf_gt_;
104  std::unique_ptr<Layer<EsdfVoxel> > esdf_gt_;
105 };
106 
107 TEST_P(ClearSphereTest, EsdfIntegrators) {
108  // TSDF layer + integrator
109  TsdfIntegratorBase::Config config;
110  config.default_truncation_distance = truncation_distance_;
111  config.integrator_threads = 1;
112  Layer<TsdfVoxel> tsdf_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
113  MergedTsdfIntegrator tsdf_integrator(config, &tsdf_layer);
114 
115  // ESDF layers
116  Layer<EsdfVoxel> esdf_layer(voxel_size_, voxels_per_side_);
117 
118  EsdfIntegrator::Config esdf_config;
119  esdf_config.max_distance_m = esdf_max_distance_;
120  esdf_config.default_distance_m = esdf_max_distance_;
121  esdf_config.min_distance_m = truncation_distance_ / 2.0;
122  esdf_config.min_diff_m = 0.0;
123  esdf_config.full_euclidean_distance = false;
124  esdf_config.add_occupied_crust = false;
125  esdf_config.multi_queue = false;
126  esdf_config.clear_sphere_radius = 1.0;
127  esdf_config.occupied_sphere_radius = 4.0;
128  EsdfIntegrator esdf_integrator(esdf_config, &tsdf_layer, &esdf_layer);
129 
130  size_t i = 0;
131  Pointcloud ptcloud, ptcloud_C;
132  Colors colors;
133  constexpr bool clear_updated_flag = true;
134 
135  // Ok for the first pose... Let's do this one at a time.
136  esdf_integrator.addNewRobotPosition(poses_[i].getPosition());
137 
138  // Output for debugging.
139  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_clear1a.voxblox", true);
140  io::SaveLayer(esdf_layer, "esdf_clear1a.voxblox", false);
141 
142  world_.getPointcloudFromTransform(poses_[i], depth_camera_resolution_,
143  fov_h_rad_, max_dist_, &ptcloud, &colors);
144  transformPointcloud(poses_[i].inverse(), ptcloud, &ptcloud_C);
145  tsdf_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
146 
147  // Update the ESDF integrator.
148  esdf_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayer(clear_updated_flag);
149 
150  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_clear1b.voxblox", true);
151  io::SaveLayer(esdf_layer, "esdf_clear1b.voxblox", false);
152  i = 2;
153 
154  esdf_integrator.addNewRobotPosition(poses_[i].getPosition());
155 
156  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_clear2a.voxblox", true);
157  io::SaveLayer(esdf_layer, "esdf_clear2a.voxblox", false);
158 
159  ptcloud.clear();
160  colors.clear();
161  ptcloud_C.clear();
162  world_.getPointcloudFromTransform(poses_[i], depth_camera_resolution_,
163  fov_h_rad_, max_dist_, &ptcloud, &colors);
164  transformPointcloud(poses_[i].inverse(), ptcloud, &ptcloud_C);
165  tsdf_integrator.integratePointCloud(poses_[i], ptcloud_C, colors);
166  esdf_integrator.updateFromTsdfLayer(clear_updated_flag);
167 
168  io::SaveLayer(tsdf_layer, "esdf_clear2b.voxblox", true);
169  io::SaveLayer(esdf_layer, "esdf_clear2b.voxblox", false);
170 
171  // Main test: compare every voxel in ESDF and TSDF. Those within truncation
172  // distance should match TSDF and not be hallucinated.
173  BlockIndexList block_list;
174  tsdf_layer.getAllAllocatedBlocks(&block_list);
175  size_t vps = tsdf_layer.voxels_per_side();
176  size_t num_voxels_per_block = vps * vps * vps;
177 
178  for (const BlockIndex& block_index : block_list) {
179  const Block<TsdfVoxel>& tsdf_block =
180  tsdf_layer.getBlockByIndex(block_index);
181  ASSERT_TRUE(esdf_layer.hasBlock(block_index));
182  const Block<EsdfVoxel>& esdf_block =
183  esdf_layer.getBlockByIndex(block_index);
184 
185  for (size_t linear_index = 0u; linear_index < num_voxels_per_block;
186  ++linear_index) {
187  const TsdfVoxel& tsdf_voxel =
188  tsdf_block.getVoxelByLinearIndex(linear_index);
189  const EsdfVoxel& esdf_voxel =
190  esdf_block.getVoxelByLinearIndex(linear_index);
191 
192  if (tsdf_voxel.weight < 1e-6 && esdf_voxel.observed) {
193  EXPECT_TRUE(esdf_voxel.hallucinated);
194  }
195  if (tsdf_voxel.weight > 1e-6 &&
196  std::abs(tsdf_voxel.distance) <= esdf_config.min_distance_m) {
197  EXPECT_TRUE(esdf_voxel.observed);
198  EXPECT_FALSE(esdf_voxel.hallucinated);
199  EXPECT_EQ(signum(tsdf_voxel.distance), signum(esdf_voxel.distance));
200  EXPECT_NEAR(tsdf_voxel.distance, esdf_voxel.distance, 1e-3);
201  }
202  }
203  }
204 
205  io::SaveLayer(*tsdf_gt_, "esdf_clear_gt.voxblox", true);
206  io::SaveLayer(*esdf_gt_, "esdf_clear_gt.voxblox", false);
207 }
208 
209 INSTANTIATE_TEST_CASE_P(VoxelSizes, ClearSphereTest,
210  ::testing::Values(0.1f, 0.2f));
211 
212 int main(int argc, char** argv) {
213  ::testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
214 
215  FLAGS_logtostderr = true;
216  FLAGS_alsologtostderr = true;
217  FLAGS_v = 1;
218 
219  google::InitGoogleLogging(argv[0]);
220 
221  int result = RUN_ALL_TESTS();
222 
223  voxblox::timing::Timing::Print(std::cout);
224 
225  return result;
226 }
